QuestData.Title: Windshear Mine Cleanup
QuestData.Description: The Horde has overrun Windshear Mine. I'm not sure what these orcs are hauling out of here or why they're here, but I know that it can't be good. Get in that mine and take out the management. Without goblin overseers, these peons will be even more worthless.$B$BWhile you're inside, keep your eyes peeled for any other information about the Horde operation in the mines.$B$BGood luck!
QuestData.RewardText: Nice job, I could hear their shrill screams from out here. You've turned the whole place on its head!$B$BDid you happen to find any other information about the mining operation?
